   19: -module(map_no_module_opt_SUITE).

   21: 	init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2
   22:     ]).
   23: 
   24: -export([
   25:          %% literals
   26:          t_build_and_match_literals/1, t_build_and_match_literals_large/1,
   27:          t_update_literals/1, t_update_literals_large/1,
   28:          t_match_and_update_literals/1, t_match_and_update_literals_large/1,
   29:          t_update_map_expressions/1,
   30:          t_update_assoc/1, t_update_assoc_large/1,
   31:          t_update_exact/1, t_update_exact_large/1,
   32:          t_guard_bifs/1,
   33:          t_guard_sequence/1, t_guard_sequence_large/1,
   34:          t_guard_update/1, t_guard_update_large/1,
   35:          t_guard_receive/1, t_guard_receive_large/1,
   36:          t_guard_fun/1,
   37:          t_list_comprehension/1,
   38:          t_map_sort_literals/1,
   39:          t_map_size/1, t_map_get/1,
   40:          t_build_and_match_aliasing/1,
   41:          t_is_map/1,
   42: 
   43:          %% variables
   44:          t_build_and_match_variables/1,
   45:          t_update_assoc_variables/1,t_update_exact_variables/1,
   46:          t_nested_pattern_expressions/1,
   47:          t_guard_update_variables/1,
   48:          t_guard_sequence_variables/1,
   49:          t_guard_sequence_mixed/1,
   50:          t_frequency_table/1,
   51: 
   52:          %% warnings
   53:          t_warn_useless_build/1,
   54:          t_warn_pair_key_overloaded/1,
   55: 
   56:          %% not covered in 17.0-rc1
   57:          t_build_and_match_over_alloc/1,
   58:          t_build_and_match_empty_val/1,
   59:          t_build_and_match_val/1,
   60:          t_build_and_match_nil/1,
   61:          t_build_and_match_structure/1,
   62: 
   63:          %% errors in 17.0-rc1
   64:          t_update_values/1,
   65:          t_expand_map_update/1,
   66:          t_export/1,
   67: 
   68:          %% errors in 18
   69:          t_register_corruption/1,
   70:          t_bad_update/1,
   71: 
   72:          %% new in OTP 21
   73:          t_reused_key_variable/1,
   74: 
   75:          %% new in OTP 22
   76:          t_mixed_clause/1,cover_beam_trim/1,
   77:          t_duplicate_keys/1,
   78: 
   79:          %% new in OTP 23
   80:          t_key_expressions/1,
   81: 
   82:          %% cover more code in beam_call_types
   83:          t_bif_map_find/1,
   84:          t_fold_3/1, t_from_keys/1, t_map_2/1, t_maps_take_2/1,
   85:          t_update_with_3/1, t_update_with_4/1,
   86:          t_with_2/1,
   87: 
   88:          %% miscellaneous
   89:          t_conflicting_destinations/1,
   90:          t_cse_assoc/1,
   91:          shared_key_tuples/1,
   92:          map_aliases/1,
   93:          coverage/1
   94:         ]).
   95: 
   96: -define(badmap(V, F, Args), {'EXIT', {{badmap,V}, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   97: -define(badkey(K, F, Args), {'EXIT', {{badkey,K}, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   98: -define(badarg(F, Args), {'EXIT', {badarg, [{maps,F,Args,_}|_]}}).
   99: 
  100: suite() -> [].
  101: 
  102: all() ->
  103:     [
  104:      %% literals
  105:      t_build_and_match_literals, t_build_and_match_literals_large,
  106:      t_update_literals, t_update_literals_large,
  107:      t_match_and_update_literals, t_match_and_update_literals_large,
  108:      t_update_map_expressions,
  109:      t_update_assoc, t_update_assoc_large,
  110:      t_update_exact, t_update_exact_large,
  111:      t_guard_bifs,
  112:      t_guard_sequence, t_guard_sequence_large,
  113:      t_guard_update, t_guard_update_large,
  114:      t_guard_receive, t_guard_receive_large,
  115:      t_guard_fun, t_list_comprehension,
  116:      t_map_sort_literals,
  117:      t_map_size, t_map_get,
  118:      t_build_and_match_aliasing,
  119:      t_is_map,
  120: 
  121:      %% variables
  122:      t_build_and_match_variables,
  123:      t_update_assoc_variables,t_update_exact_variables,
  124:      t_nested_pattern_expressions,
  125:      t_guard_update_variables,
  126:      t_guard_sequence_variables,
  127:      t_guard_sequence_mixed,
  128:      t_frequency_table,
  129: 
  130:      %% warnings
  131:      t_warn_useless_build,
  132:      t_warn_pair_key_overloaded,
  133: 
  134:      %% not covered in 17.0-rc1
  135:      t_build_and_match_over_alloc,
  136:      t_build_and_match_empty_val,
  137:      t_build_and_match_val,
  138:      t_build_and_match_nil,
  139:      t_build_and_match_structure,
  140: 
  141:      %% errors in 17.0-rc1
  142:      t_update_values,

  144:      t_export,
  145: 
  146:      %% errors in 18
  147:      t_register_corruption,

  150:      %% new in OTP 21

  154:      t_mixed_clause,cover_beam_trim,
  155:      t_duplicate_keys,
  156: 
  157:      %% new in OTP 23
  158:      t_key_expressions,

  160:      %% cover more code
  161:      t_bif_map_find,
  162:      t_fold_3, t_from_keys, t_map_2, t_maps_take_2,
  163:      t_update_with_3, t_update_with_4, t_with_2,
  164: 
  165:      %% miscellaneous
  166:      t_conflicting_destinations,
  167:      t_cse_assoc,
  168:      shared_key_tuples,
  169:      map_aliases,
  170:      coverage
  171:     ].
  172: 
  173: groups() -> [].
  174: 
  175: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  176:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
  177:     Config.
  178: 
  179: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  180:     ok.
  181: 
  182: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) -> Config.
  183: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) -> Config.
  184: 
  185: %% tests
  186: 
  187: t_build_and_match_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  188:     #{} = id(#{}),
  189:     #{1:=a} = id(#{1=>a}),
  190:     #{1:=a,2:=b} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b}),
  191:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c"} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c"}),
  192:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d"} = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d"}),
  193:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>} =
  194: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>}),
  195:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>,{"6",7}:="f"} =
  196: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>,{"6",7}=>"f"}),
  197:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3:="c","4":="d",<<"5">>:=<<"e">>,{"6",7}:="f",8:=g} =
  198: 	id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3=>"c","4"=>"d",<<"5">>=><<"e">>,{"6",7}=>"f",8=>g}),
  199: 
  200:     #{<<"hi all">> := 1} = id(#{<<"hi",32,"all">> => 1}),
  201: 
  202:     #{a:=X,a:=X=3,b:=4} = id(#{a=>3,b=>4}), % weird but ok =)
  203: 
  204:     #{ a:=#{ b:=#{c := third, b:=second}}, b:=first} =
  205: 	id(#{ b=>first, a=>#{ b=>#{c => third, b=> second}}}),
  206: 
  207:     M = #{ map_1=>#{ map_2=>#{value_3 => third}, value_2=> second}, value_1=>first},
  208:     M = #{ map_1:=#{ map_2:=#{value_3 := third}, value_2:= second}, value_1:=first} =
  209: 	 id(#{ map_1=>#{ map_2=>#{value_3 => third}, value_2=> second}, value_1=>first}),
  210: 
  211:     %% map key
  212:     #{ #{} := 42 } = id(#{ #{} => 42 }),
  213:     #{ #{ "a" => 3 } := 42 } = id(#{ #{ "a" => 3} => 42 }),
  214: 
  215:     %% nil key
  216:     #{[]:=ok,1:=2} = id(#{[]=>ok,1=>2}),
  217:     #{1:=2,[]:=ok,1:=2} = id(#{[]=>ok,1=>2}),
  218: 
  219:     %% pseudo literals
  220:     #{ -3 := yep } = id(#{ -3 => yep }),
  221:     #{ <<0:358>> := "three" } = id(#{<<0:358>> =>"three"}),
  222: 
  223:     %% error case
  224:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3,x:=2} = id(#{x=>3}))),
  225:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=2} = id(#{x=>3}))),
  226:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id({a,b,c}))),
  227:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id(#{y=>3}))),
  228:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{x:=3} = id(#{x=>"three"}))),
  229:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{#{"a"=>42} := 3}=id(#{#{"a"=>3}=>42}))),
  230:     ok.
  231: 
  232: t_build_and_match_literals_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  233:     % normal non-repeating
  234:     M0 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  235:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  236:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  237:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  238:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  239: 
  240:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  241:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  242:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  243:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  244:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" }),
  245: 
  246:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M0,
  247:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M0,
  248:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M0,
  249:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M0,
  250:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M0,
  251: 
  252:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M0,
  253:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M0,
  254:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M0,
  255:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M0,
  256:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M0,
  257: 
  258:     60 = map_size(M0),
  259:     60 = maps:size(M0),
  260: 
  261:     % with repeating
  262:     M1 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  263:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  264:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  265:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  266:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  267: 
  268:                10=>na0,20=>nb0,30=>"nc0","40"=>"nd0",<<"50">>=>"ne0",{["00"]}=>"n10",
  269:                11=>na1,21=>nb1,31=>"nc1","41"=>"nd1",<<"51">>=>"ne1",{["01"]}=>"n11",
  270:                12=>na2,22=>nb2,32=>"nc2","42"=>"nd2",<<"52">>=>"ne2",{["02"]}=>"n12",
  271: 
  272:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  273:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  274:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  275: 
  276:                13=>na3,23=>nb3,33=>"nc3","43"=>"nd3",<<"53">>=>"ne3",{["03"]}=>"n13",
  277:                14=>na4,24=>nb4,34=>"nc4","44"=>"nd4",<<"54">>=>"ne4",{["04"]}=>"n14",
  278: 
  279:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  280:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" }),
  281: 
  282:     #{10:=na0,20:=nb0,30:="nc0","40":="nd0",<<"50">>:="ne0",{["00"]}:="n10"} = M1,
  283:     #{11:=na1,21:=nb1,31:="nc1","41":="nd1",<<"51">>:="ne1",{["01"]}:="n11"} = M1,
  284:     #{12:=na2,22:=nb2,32:="nc2","42":="nd2",<<"52">>:="ne2",{["02"]}:="n12"} = M1,
  285:     #{13:=na3,23:=nb3,33:="nc3","43":="nd3",<<"53">>:="ne3",{["03"]}:="n13"} = M1,
  286:     #{14:=na4,24:=nb4,34:="nc4","44":="nd4",<<"54">>:="ne4",{["04"]}:="n14"} = M1,
  287: 
  288:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M1,
  289:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M1,
  290:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M1,
  291:     #{18:=a8,28:=b8,38:="c8","48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M1,
  292:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M1,
  293: 
  294:     60 = map_size(M1),
  295:     60 = maps:size(M1),
  296: 
  297:     % with floats
  298: 
  299:     M2 = id(#{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  300:                11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  301:                12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  302:                13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  303:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  304: 
  305:                15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  306:                16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  307:                17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  308:                18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  309:                19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19",
  310: 
  311:                10.0=>fa0,20.0=>fb0,30.0=>"fc0",
  312:                11.0=>fa1,21.0=>fb1,31.0=>"fc1",
  313:                12.0=>fa2,22.0=>fb2,32.0=>"fc2",
  314:                13.0=>fa3,23.0=>fb3,33.0=>"fc3",
  315:                14.0=>fa4,24.0=>fb4,34.0=>"fc4",
  316: 
  317:                15.0=>fa5,25.0=>fb5,35.0=>"fc5",
  318:                16.0=>fa6,26.0=>fb6,36.0=>"fc6",
  319:                17.0=>fa7,27.0=>fb7,37.0=>"fc7",
  320:                18.0=>fa8,28.0=>fb8,38.0=>"fc8",
  321:                19.0=>fa9,29.0=>fb9,39.0=>"fc9"}),
  322: 
  323:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M2,
  324:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,

  614:

  626: 
  627:     95 = map_size(M5),
  628:     95 = maps:size(M5),

  630:     %% remember
  631: 
  632:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,30:="c0","40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0",{["00"]}:="10"} = M0,
  633:     #{11:=a1,21:=b1,31:="c1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M0,
  634:     #{12:=a2,22:=b2,32:="c2","42":="d2",<<"52">>:="e2",{["02"]}:="12"} = M0,
  635:     #{13:=a3,23:=b3,33:="c3","43":="d3",<<"53">>:="e3",{["03"]}:="13"} = M0,
  636:     #{14:=a4,24:=b4,34:="c4","44":="d4",<<"54">>:="e4",{["04"]}:="14"} = M0,
  637: 
  638:     #{10:=na0,20:=nb0,30:="nc0","40":="nd0",<<"50">>:="ne0",{["00"]}:="n10"} = M1,
  639:     #{11:=na1,21:=nb1,31:="nc1","41":="nd1",<<"51">>:="ne1",{["01"]}:="n11"} = M1,
  640:     #{12:=na2,22:=nb2,32:="nc2","42":="nd2",<<"52">>:="ne2",{["02"]}:="n12"} = M1,
  641:     #{13:=na3,23:=nb3,33:="nc3","43":="nd3",<<"53">>:="ne3",{["03"]}:="n13"} = M1,
  642:     #{14:=na4,24:=nb4,34:="nc4","44":="nd4",<<"54">>:="ne4",{["04"]}:="n14"} = M1,
  643: 
  644:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M1,
  645:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M1,
  646:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M1,

  648:     #{19:=a9,29:=b9,39:="c9","49":="d9",<<"59">>:="e9",{["09"]}:="19"} = M1,
  649: 
  650:     #{15:=a5,25:=b5,35:="c5","45":="d5",<<"55">>:="e5",{["05"]}:="15"} = M2,
  651:     #{16:=a6,26:=b6,36:="c6","46":="d6",<<"56">>:="e6",{["06"]}:="16"} = M2,
  652:     #{17:=a7,27:=b7,37:="c7","47":="d7",<<"57">>:="e7",{["07"]}:="17"} = M2,

  657:     #{11.0:=fa1,21.0:=fb1,31.0:="fc1","41":="d1",<<"51">>:="e1",{["01"]}:="11"} = M2,

  661:

  683:     #{4294967295:=big7,73786976294838206464:=big2,"48":="d8",<<"58">>:="e8",{["08"]}:="18"} = M3,

  686: 
  687: 
  688: t_build_and_match_aliasing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  689:     M1 = id(#{a=>1,b=>2,c=>3,d=>4}),
  690:     #{c:=C1=_=_=C2} = M1,
  691:     true = C1 =:= C2,
  692:     #{a:=A,a:=A,a:=A,b:=B,b:=B} = M1,
  693:     #{a:=A,a:=A,a:=A,b:=B,b:=B,b:=2} = M1,
  694:     #{a:=A=1,a:=A,a:=A,b:=B=2,b:=B,b:=2} = M1,
  695:     #{c:=C1, c:=_, c:=3, c:=_, c:=C2} = M1,
  696:     #{c:=C=_=3=_=C} = M1,
  697: 
  698:     M2 = id(#{"a"=>1,"b"=>2,"c"=>3,"d"=>4}),
  699:     #{"a":=A2,"a":=A2,"a":=A2,"b":=B2,"b":=B2,"b":=2} = M2,
  700:     #{"a":=_,"a":=_,"a":=_,"b":=_,"b":=_,"b":=2} = M2,
  701: 
  702:     #{a:=A1,a:=A1,a:=A1,b:=B1,b:=B1} = #{a:=A1,a:=A1,a:=A1,b:=B1,b:=B1,b:=2} = M1,
  703:     #{"a":=A3,"b":=B3} = #{"a":=A3,"a":=A3} = #{"b":=B3,"b":=2} = M2,
  704: 
  705:     #{"a":=1,"b":=2,"c":=3,"d":=4} = #{"a":=A4,"b":=B4} = #{"a":=A4,"a":=A4} = #{"b":=B4,"d":=4} = M2,
  706:     #{"a":=A5,"b":=B5} = #{"a":=A5,"a":=A5} = #{"b":=B5,"d":=4} = #{"a":=1,"b":=2,"c":=3,"d":=4} = M2,
  707:     #{"a":=_,"b":=_} = #{"a":=_,"a":=_} = #{"b":=_,"d":=4} = #{"a":=1,"b":=2,"c":=3,"d":=4} = M2,
  708: 
  709:     M3 = id(#{<<12:300>>=>1,<<13:300>>=>2}),
  710:     #{<<12:300>> := V1, <<13:300>> := V2} = #{<<13:300>> := V2, <<12:300>> := V1} = M3,
  711:     #{<<12:300>> := 1, <<13:300>> := 2} = #{<<13:300>> := _, <<12:300>> := _} = M3,
  712:     #{<<13:300>> := _, <<12:300>> := _} = #{<<12:300>> := 1, <<13:300>> := 2} = M3,
  713: 
  714:     ok.
  715: 
  716: t_map_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  717:     0 = map_size(id(#{})),
  718:     1 = map_size(id(#{a=>1})),
  719:     1 = map_size(id(#{a=>"wat"})),
  720:     2 = map_size(id(#{a=>1, b=>2})),
  721:     3 = map_size(id(#{a=>1, b=>2, b=>"3","33"=><<"n">>})),
  722: 
  723:     true = map_is_size(#{a=>1}, 1),
  724:     true = map_is_size(#{a=>1, a=>2}, 1),
  725:     M = #{ "a" => 1, "b" => 2},
  726:     true  = map_is_size(M, 2),
  727:     false = map_is_size(M, 3),
  728:     true  = map_is_size(M#{ "a" => 2}, 2),
  729:     false = map_is_size(M#{ "c" => 2}, 2),
  730: 
  731:     %% Error cases.
  732:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,[]},_}} = (catch map_size([])),
  733:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<1,2,3>>},_}} = (catch map_size(<<1,2,3>>)),
  734:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,1},_}} = (catch map_size(1)),
  735:     ok.
  736: 
  737: map_is_size(M,N) when map_size(M) =:= N -> true;
  738: map_is_size(_,_) -> false.
  739: 
  740: t_map_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  741:     1 = map_get(a, id(#{a=>1})),
  742: 
  743:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch map_get(a, #{})),
  744:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch map_get(a, #{b=>1})),
  745: 
  746:     M = #{"a"=>1, "b" => 2},
  747:     true = check_map_value(M, "a", 1),
  748:     false = check_map_value(M, "b", 1),
  749:     true = check_map_value(M#{"c"=>2}, "c", 2),
  750:     false = check_map_value(M#{"a"=>5}, "a", 1),
  751: 
  752:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,[]},_}} = (catch map_get(a, [])),
  753:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<1,2,3>>},_}} = (catch map_get(a, <<1,2,3>>)),
  754:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,1},_}} = (catch map_get(a, 1)),
  755: 
  756:     %% Test that beam_validator understands that NewMap is
  757:     %% a map after seeing map_get(a, NewMap).
  758:     NewMap = id(#{a=>b}),
  759:     b = map_get(a, NewMap),
  760:     #{a:=z} = NewMap#{a:=z},
  761:     ok.
  762: 
  763: check_map_value(Map, Key, Value) when map_get(Key, Map) =:= Value -> true;
  764: check_map_value(_, _, _) -> false.
  765: 
  766: t_is_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  767:     true = is_map(#{}),
  768:     true = is_map(#{a=>1}),
  769:     false = is_map({a,b}),
  770:     false = is_map(x),
  771:     if is_map(#{}) -> ok end,
  772:     if is_map(#{b=>1}) -> ok end,
  773:     if not is_map([1,2,3]) -> ok end,
  774:     if not is_map(x) -> ok end,
  775: 
  776:     ok = do_t_is_map(map, #{}),
  777:     error = do_t_is_map(map, {a,b,c}),
  778:     ok = do_t_is_map(number, 42),
  779:     ok = do_t_is_map(number, 42.0),
  780:     error = do_t_is_map(number, {a,b,c}),
  781:     ok.
  782: 
  783: do_t_is_map(What, X) ->
  784:     B = case What of
  785:             map ->
  786:                 %% Cover conversion of is_map/1 BIF to test instruction
  787:                 %% in beam_utils:bif_to_test/3.
  788:                 is_map(X);
  789:             number ->
  790:                 is_number(X)
  791:         end,
  792:     case B of
  793:         true -> ok;
  794:         false -> error
  795:     end.
  796: 
  797: % test map updates without matching
  798: t_update_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  799:     Map = #{x=>1,y=>2,z=>3,q=>4},
  800:     #{x:="d",q:="4"} = loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [
  801: 		{"a","1"},{"b","2"},{"c","3"},{"d","4"}
  802: 	]),
  803:     ok.
  804:

  840:                    15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  841:                    16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  842:                    17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  843:                    18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  844:                    19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
  845: 
  846:                 #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
  847:                    11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
  848:                    12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
  849:                    13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
  850:                    14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
  851: 
  852:                    15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
  853:                    k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
  854:                    17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
  855:                    18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
  856:                    19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => id("large map key 2") }),
  857: 
  858:     #{x:="d",q:="4"} = loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [
  859: 		{"a","1"},{"b","2"},{"c","3"},{"d","4"}
  860: 	]),
  861:     ok.
  862: 
  863: 
  864: 
  865: loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, []) -> Map;
  866: loop_update_literals_x_q(Map, [{X,Q}|Vs]) ->
  867:     loop_update_literals_x_q(Map#{q=>Q,x=>X},Vs).
  868: 
  869: % test map updates with matching
  870: t_match_and_update_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  871:     Map = #{ x=>0,y=>"untouched",z=>"also untouched",q=>1,
  872:              #{ "one" => small, map => key } => "small map key 1" },
  873:  
  874:     #{x:=16,q:=21,y:="untouched",z:="also untouched"} = loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map, [
  875: 	    {1,2},{3,4},{5,6},{7,8}
  876: 	]),
  877:     M0 = id(#{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
  878: 	    4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat}),
  879:     M1 = id(#{}),
  880:     M2 = M1#{ "hi" => "hello", int => 3, <<"key">> => <<"value">>,
  881: 	4 => number, 18446744073709551629 => wat},
  882:     M0 = M2,
  883: 
  884:     #{ 4 := another_number, int := 3 } = M2#{ 4 => another_number },
  885:     ok.
  886:

  955: loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map, []) -> Map;
  956: loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(#{ q:=Q0, x:=X0,
  957:                                      #{ "one" => small, map => key } := "small map key 1" } = Map, [{X,Q}|Vs]) ->
  958:     loop_match_and_update_literals_x_q(Map#{q=>Q0+Q,x=>X0+X},Vs).
  959: 
  960: 
  961: t_update_map_expressions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  962:     M = maps:new(),
  963:     X = id(fondue),
  964:     M1 = #{ a := 1 } = M#{a => 1},
  965:     #{ b := {X} } = M1#{ a := 1, b => {X} },
  966: 
  967:     #{ b := 2 } = (maps:new())#{ b => 2 },
  968: 
  969:     #{ a :=42, b:=42, c:=42 } = (maps:from_list([{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}]))#{ a := 42, b := 42, c := 42 },
  970:     #{ "a" :=1, "b":=42, "c":=42 } = (maps:from_list([{"a",1},{"b",2}]))#{ "b" := 42, "c" => 42 },
  971: 
  972:     %% Test need to be in a fun.
  973:     %% This tests that let expr optimisation in sys_core_fold
  974:     %% covers maps correctly.
  975:     F = fun() ->
  976: 	    M0 = id(#{ "a" => [1,2,3] }),
  977: 	    #{ "a" := _ } = M0,
  978: 	    M0#{ "a" := b }
  979:     end,
  980: 
  981:     #{ "a" := b } = F(),
  982: 
  983:     %% Error cases.
  984:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch (id(<<>>))#{ a := 42, b => 2 }),
  985:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,[]},_}} = (catch (id([]))#{ a := 42, b => 2 }),
  986:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,_},_}} =
  987: 	(catch (fun t_update_map_expressions/1)#{u => 42}),
  988: 
  989:     ok.
  990: 
  991: 
  992: t_update_assoc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  993:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
  994: 
  995:     M1 = M0#{1=>42,2=>100,4=>[a,b,c]},
  996:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
  997:     #{1:=42,2:=b,4:=d,5:=e,2.0:=100,3.0:=c,4.0:=[a,b,c]} = M0#{1.0=>float,1:=42,2.0=>wrong,2.0=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
  998: 
  999:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>new},
 1000:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3.0:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1001:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=wrong,3.0=>new},
 1002: 
 1003:     % Can't handle directly yet
 1004:     Bin = <<0:257>>,
 1005:     #{ Bin := val } = id(M0#{<<0:257>> => val}), %% binary limitation
 1006: 
 1007:     %% Errors cases.
 1008:     BadMap = id(badmap),
 1009:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,BadMap},_}} = (catch BadMap#{nonexisting=>val}),
 1010:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch <<>>#{nonexisting=>val}),
 1011:     F1 = fun() ->
 1012:                  0 #{part => V = false},
 1013:                  V
 1014:          end,
 1015:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,0},_}} = (catch F1()),
 1016:     F2 = fun() ->
 1017:                  case 42 of
 1018:                      V ->
 1019:                          [];
 1020:                      power ->
 1021:                          []#{key =>
 1022:                                  receive
 1023:                                      V -> false
 1024:                                  end}
 1025:                  end,
 1026:                  V
 1027:          end,
 1028:     42 = F2(),
 1029: 
 1030:     %% Evaluation order.
 1031:     {'EXIT',{blurf,_}} =
 1032: 	(catch BadMap#{whatever=>id(error(blurf))}),
 1033:     {'EXIT',{blurf,_}} =
 1034: 	(catch BadMap#{id(error(blurf))=>whatever}),
 1035:     ok.
 1036:

 1042:                14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",

 1089: 
 1090: 
 1091:     M1 = M0#{1=>42,2=>100,4=>[a,b,c]},
 1092:     #{1:=42,2:=100,10.0:=fa0,4:=[a,b,c],25:=b5} = M1,
 1093:     #{ 10:=43, 24:=b4, 15:=a5, 35:="c5", 2.0:=100, 13.0:=fa3, 4.0:=[a,b,c]} =
 1094:         M0#{1.0=>float,10:=43,2.0=>wrong,2.0=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
 1095: 
 1096:     M2 = M0#{13.0=>new},
 1097:     #{10:=a0,20:=b0,13.0:=new,"40":="d0",<<"50">>:="e0"} = M2,
 1098:     M2 = M0#{13.0:=wrong,13.0=>new},
 1099: 
 1100:     %% Errors cases.
 1101:     BadMap = id({no,map}),
 1102:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,BadMap},_}} = (catch BadMap#{nonexisting=>M0}),

 1106: 
 1107: t_update_exact(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1108:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1109: 
 1110:     M1 = M0#{1:=42,2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1111:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1112:     M1 = M0#{1:=wrong,1=>42,2=>wrong,2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1113: 
 1114:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=new},
 1115:     #{1:=a,2:=b,3.0:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1116:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>wrong,3.0:=new},
 1117:     true = M2 =/= M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 1118:     #{ 3 := right, 3.0 := new } = M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 1119: 
 1120:     M3 = id(#{ 1 => val}),
 1121:     #{1 := update2,1.0 := new_val4} = M3#{
 1122: 	1.0 => new_val1, 1 := update, 1=> update3,
 1123: 	1 := update2, 1.0 := new_val2, 1.0 => new_val3,
 1124: 	1.0 => new_val4 },
 1125: 
 1126:     %% Errors cases.
 1127:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,nil},_}} = (catch ((id(nil))#{ a := b })),
 1128:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch M0#{nonexisting:=val}),
 1129:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,1.0},_}} = (catch M0#{1.0:=v,1.0=>v2}),
 1130:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42},_}} = (catch M0#{42.0:=v,42:=v2}),
 1131:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42.0},_}} = (catch M0#{42=>v1,42.0:=v2,42:=v3}),
 1132:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch <<>>#{nonexisting:=val}),
 1133:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,<<0:257>>},_}} =
 1134: 	(catch M0#{<<0:257>> := val}),		%limitation
 1135: 
 1136:     %% A workaround for a bug allowed an empty map to be updated.
 1137:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch (id(#{}))#{a:=1}),
 1138:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch #{}#{a:=1}),
 1139:     Empty = #{},
 1140:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} = (catch Empty#{a:=1}),
 1141: 
 1142:     %% Evaluation order.
 1143:     BadMap = id([no,map]),
 1144:     {'EXIT',{blurf,_}} =
 1145: 	(catch BadMap#{whatever:=id(error(blurf))}),
 1146:     {'EXIT',{blurf,_}} =

 1149: 	(catch BadMap#{id(nonexisting):=whatever}),

 1234: t_update_values(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1235:     V0 = id(1337),
 1236:     M0 = #{ a => 1, val => V0},
 1237:     V1 = get_val(M0),
 1238:     M1 = id(M0#{ val := [V0,V1], "wazzup" => 42 }),
 1239:     [1337, {some_val, 1337}] = get_val(M1),
 1240:     M2 = id(M1#{ <<42:333>> => 1337 }),
 1241:     {bin_key,1337} = get_val(M2),
 1242: 
 1243:     N = 110,
 1244:     List = [{[I,1,2,3,I],{1,2,3,"wat",I}}|| I <- lists:seq(1,N)],
 1245: 
 1246:     {_,_,#{val2 := {1,2,3,"wat",N}, val1 := [N,1,2,3,N]}} = lists:foldl(fun
 1247: 	    ({V2,V3},{Old2,Old3,Mi}) ->
 1248: 		ok = check_val(Mi,Old2,Old3),
 1249: 		#{ val1 := Old2, val2 := Old3 } = Mi,
 1250: 		{V2,V3, Mi#{ val1 := id(V2), val2 := V1, val2 => id(V3)}}
 1251: 	end, {none, none, #{val1=>none,val2=>none}},List),
 1252:     ok.

 1256:     #{<<"hello">> := <<"les gens">>} = M,
 1257:     ok.

 1259: t_export(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1260:     Raclette = id(#{}),
 1261:     case brie of brie -> Fromage = Raclette end,
 1262:     Raclette = Fromage#{},
 1263:     ok.
 1264: 
 1265: check_val(#{val1:=V1, val2:=V2},V1,V2) -> ok.
 1266: 
 1267: get_val(#{ <<42:333>> := V }) -> {bin_key, V};
 1268: get_val(#{ "wazzup" := _, val := V}) -> V;
 1269: get_val(#{ val := V }) -> {some_val, V}.

 1271: t_guard_bifs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1272:     true   = map_guard_empty(),
 1273:     true   = map_guard_empty_2(),
 1274:     true   = map_guard_head(#{a=>1}),
 1275:     false  = map_guard_head([]),
 1276: 
 1277:     true   = map_get_head(#{a=>1}),
 1278:     false  = map_get_head(#{}),
 1279:     false  = map_get_head([]),
 1280: 
 1281:     true   = map_get_head_not(#{a=>false}),
 1282:     false  = map_get_head_not(#{a=>true}),
 1283:     false  = map_get_head(#{}),
 1284:     false  = map_get_head([]),
 1285: 
 1286:     true   = map_is_key_head(#{a=>1}),
 1287:     false  = map_is_key_head(#{}),
 1288:     false  = map_is_key_head(not_a_map),
 1289: 
 1290:     false  = map_is_key_head_not(#{a=>1}),
 1291:     true   = map_is_key_head_not(#{b=>1}),
 1292:     true   = map_is_key_head_not(#{}),
 1293:     false  = map_is_key_head_not(not_a_map),
 1294: 
 1295:     b = map_get_head_badmap1(),
 1296:     b = map_get_head_badmap2(),
 1297:     b = map_get_head_badmap3(),
 1298: 
 1299:     true   = map_guard_body(#{a=>1}),
 1300:     false  = map_guard_body({}),
 1301:     true   = map_guard_pattern(#{a=>1, <<"hi">> => "hi" }),
 1302:     false  = map_guard_pattern("list"),
 1303:     true   = map_guard_tautology(),
 1304:     true   = map_guard_ill_map_size(),
 1305:     true   = map_field_check_sequence(#{a=>1}),
 1306:     false  = map_field_check_sequence(#{}),
 1307: 
 1308:     %% The guard BIFs used in a body.
 1309: 
 1310:     v = map_get(a, id(#{a=>v})),
 1311:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,a},_}} =
 1312:         (catch map_get(a, id(#{}))),
 1313:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,not_a_map},_}} =
 1314:         (catch map_get(a, id(not_a_map))),
 1315: 
 1316:     true   = is_map_key(a, id(#{a=>1})),
 1317:     false  = is_map_key(b, id(#{a=>1})),
 1318:     false  = is_map_key(b, id(#{})),
 1319:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,not_a_map},_}} =
 1320:         (catch is_map_key(b, id(not_a_map))),
 1321: 
 1322:     {true,v} = erl_699(#{k=>v}),
 1323:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,k},_}} = (catch erl_699(#{})),
 1324:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,not_a_map},_}} = (catch erl_699(not_a_map)),
 1325: 
 1326:     %% Cover optimizations in beam_dead.
 1327: 
 1328:     ok = beam_dead_1(#{a=>any,k=>true}),
 1329:     error = beam_dead_1(#{a=>any,k=>false}),
 1330:     error = beam_dead_1(#{a=>any}),
 1331:     error = beam_dead_1(#{}),
 1332: 
 1333:     ok = beam_dead_2(#{a=>any,k=>true}),
 1334:     error = beam_dead_2(#{a=>any,k=>false}),
 1335:     error = beam_dead_2(#{a=>any}),
 1336:     error = beam_dead_2(#{}),
 1337: 
 1338:     ok = beam_dead_3(#{k=>true}),
 1339:     error = beam_dead_3(#{k=>false}),
 1340:     error = beam_dead_3(#{}),
 1341: 
 1342:     ok = beam_dead_4(#{k=>true}),
 1343:     error = beam_dead_4(#{k=>false}),
 1344:     error = beam_dead_4(#{}),
 1345:     error = beam_dead_4(not_a_map),
 1346: 
 1347:     ok = beam_dead_5(#{k=>true}),
 1348:     error = beam_dead_5(#{k=>false}),
 1349:     error = beam_dead_3(#{}),
 1350: 
 1351:     %% Test is_map_key/2 followed by map update.
 1352: 
 1353:     Used0 = map_usage(var, #{other=>value}),
 1354:     Used0 = #{other=>value,var=>dead},
 1355:     Used1 = map_usage(var, #{var=>live}),
 1356:     Used1 = #{var=>live},
 1357: 
 1358:     ok.
 1359: 
 1360: map_guard_empty() when is_map(#{}); false -> true.
 1361: 
 1362: map_guard_empty_2() when true; #{} andalso false -> true.
 1363: 
 1364: map_guard_head(M) when is_map(M) -> true;
 1365: map_guard_head(_) -> false.
 1366: 
 1367: map_get_head(M) when map_get(a, M) =:= 1 -> true;
 1368: map_get_head(_) -> false.
 1369: 
 1370: map_get_head_not(M) when not map_get(a, M) -> true;
 1371: map_get_head_not(_) -> false.
 1372: 
 1373: map_get_head_badmap1() when map_get(key, not_a_map), false -> a;
 1374: map_get_head_badmap1() -> b.
 1375: 
 1376: map_get_head_badmap2() when map_get(key, not_a_map), true -> a;
 1377: map_get_head_badmap2() -> b.
 1378: 
 1379: map_get_head_badmap3() when map_get(key, not_a_map) -> a;
 1380: map_get_head_badmap3() -> b.
 1381: 
 1382: map_is_key_head(M) when is_map_key(a, M) -> true;
 1383: map_is_key_head(_) -> false.
 1384: 
 1385: map_is_key_head_not(M) when not is_map_key(a, M) -> true;
 1386: map_is_key_head_not(_) -> false.
 1387: 
 1388: map_guard_body(M) -> is_map(M).
 1389: 
 1390: map_guard_pattern(#{}) -> true;
 1391: map_guard_pattern(_)   -> false.
 1392: 
 1393: map_guard_tautology() when #{} =:= #{}; true -> true.
 1394: 
 1395: map_guard_ill_map_size() when true; map_size(0) -> true.
 1396: 
 1397: map_field_check_sequence(M)
 1398:   when is_map(M) andalso is_map_key(a, M) andalso (map_get(a, M) == 1) ->
 1399:     true;
 1400: map_field_check_sequence(_) ->
 1401:     false.
 1402: 
 1403: erl_699(M) ->
 1404:     %% Used to cause an internal consistency failure.
 1405:     {is_map_key(k, M),maps:get(k, M)}.
 1406: 
 1407: beam_dead_1(#{a:=_,k:=_}=M) when map_get(k, M) ->
 1408:     ok;
 1409: beam_dead_1(#{}) ->
 1410:     error.
 1411: 
 1412: beam_dead_2(M) ->
 1413:     case M of
 1414:         #{a:=_,k:=_} when map_get(k, M) ->
 1415:             ok;
 1416:         #{} ->
 1417:             error
 1418:     end.
 1419: 
 1420: beam_dead_3(M) ->
 1421:     case M of
 1422:         #{k:=_} when map_get(k, M) ->
 1423:             ok;
 1424:         #{} ->
 1425:             error
 1426:     end.
 1427: 
 1428: beam_dead_4(M) ->
 1429:     case M of
 1430:         #{} when map_get(k, M) ->
 1431:             ok;
 1432:         _ ->
 1433:             error
 1434:     end.
 1435: 
 1436: beam_dead_5(#{}=M) when map_get(k, M) ->
 1437:     ok;
 1438: beam_dead_5(#{}) ->
 1439:     error.
 1440: 
 1441: %% Test is_map_key/2, followed by an update of the map.
 1442: map_usage(Def, Used) ->
 1443:     case is_map_key(Def, Used) of
 1444:         true -> Used;
 1445:         false -> Used#{Def=>dead}
 1446:     end.
 1447: 
 1448: 
 1449: t_guard_sequence(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1450:     {1, "a"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>1,val=>id("a")}),
 1451:     {2, "b"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>2,val=>id("b")}),
 1452:     {3, "c"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>3,val=>id("c")}),
 1453:     {4, "d"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>4,val=>id("d")}),
 1454:     {5, "e"} = map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>5,val=>id("e")}),
 1455: 
 1456:     {1,M1}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M1 = id(#{a=>3})),
 1457:     {2,M2}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M2 = id(#{a=>4, b=>4})),
 1458:     {3,gg,M3}    = map_guard_sequence_2(M3 = id(#{a=>gg, b=>4})),
 1459:     {4,sc,sc,M4} = map_guard_sequence_2(M4 = id(#{a=>sc, b=>3, c=>sc2})),
 1460:     {5,kk,kk,M5} = map_guard_sequence_2(M5 = id(#{a=>kk, b=>other, c=>sc2})),
 1461: 
 1462:     %% error case
 1463:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq=>6,val=>id("e")})),
 1464:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_2(#{b=>5})),
 1465:     ok.
