 1506:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
 1507: 
 1508:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1509:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1510:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1511:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1512:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1513: 
 1514:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1515:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1516:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1517:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1518:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 2" }),
 1519: 
 1520:     {1, "a"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>1,val=>id("a")}),
 1521:     {2, "b"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>2,val=>id("b")}),
 1522:     {3, "c"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>3,val=>id("c")}),
 1523:     {4, "d"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>4,val=>id("d")}),
 1524:     {5, "e"} = map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>5,val=>id("e")}),
 1525: 
 1526:     {1,M1}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M1 = id(M0#{a=>3})),
 1527:     {2,M2}       = map_guard_sequence_2(M2 = id(M0#{a=>4, b=>4})),
 1528:     {3,gg,M3}    = map_guard_sequence_2(M3 = id(M0#{a=>gg, b=>4})),
 1529:     {4,sc,sc,M4} = map_guard_sequence_2(M4 = id(M0#{a=>sc, b=>3, c=>sc2})),
 1530:     {5,kk,kk,M5} = map_guard_sequence_2(M5 = id(M0#{a=>kk, b=>other, c=>sc2})),
 1531: 
 1532:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_1(M0#{seq=>6,val=>id("e")})),
 1533:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_2(M0#{b=>5})),
 1534:     ok.
 1535: 
 1536: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=1=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1537: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=2=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1538: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=3=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1539: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=4=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val};
 1540: map_guard_sequence_1(#{seq:=5=Seq, val:=Val}) -> {Seq,Val}.
 1541: 
 1542: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=3 }=M) -> {1, M};
 1543: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=4 }=M) -> {2, M};
 1544: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=X, b:=4 }=M) -> {3,X,M};
 1545: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y, b:=3 }=M) when X =:= Y -> {4,X,Y,M};
 1546: map_guard_sequence_2(#{ a:=X, a:=Y }=M) when X =:= Y -> {5,X,Y,M}.
 1547: 
 1548: 
 1549: t_guard_update(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1550:     error  = map_guard_update(#{},#{}),
 1551:     first  = map_guard_update(#{}, #{x=>first}),
 1552:     second = map_guard_update(#{y=>old}, #{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1553:     third  = map_guard_update(#{x=>old,y=>old}, #{x=>third,y=>old}),
 1554:     bad_map_guard_update(),
 1555:     ok.
 1556: 
 1557: t_guard_update_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1558:     M0 = id(#{ 70=>a0,80=>b0,90=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00",03]}=>"10",
 1559:                71=>a1,81=>b1,91=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01",03]}=>"11",
 1560:                72=>a2,82=>b2,92=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02",03]}=>"12",
 1561:                73=>a3,83=>b3,93=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03",03]}=>"13",
 1562:                74=>a4,84=>b4,94=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04",03]}=>"14",
 1563: 
 1564:                75=>a5,85=>b5,95=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05",03]}=>"15",
 1565:                76=>a6,86=>b6,96=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06",03]}=>"16",
 1566:                77=>a7,87=>b7,97=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07",03]}=>"17",
 1567:                78=>a8,88=>b8,98=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08",03]}=>"18",
 1568:                79=>a9,89=>b9,99=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09",03]}=>"19",
 1569: 
 1570:                70.0=>fa0,80.0=>fb0,90.0=>"fc0",
 1571:                71.0=>fa1,81.0=>fb1,91.0=>"fc1",
 1572:                72.0=>fa2,82.0=>fb2,92.0=>"fc2",
 1573:                73.0=>fa3,83.0=>fb3,93.0=>"fc3",
 1574:                74.0=>fa4,84.0=>fb4,94.0=>"fc4",
 1575: 
 1576:                75.0=>fa5,85.0=>fb5,95.0=>"fc5",
 1577:                76.0=>fa6,86.0=>fb6,96.0=>"fc6",
 1578:                77.0=>fa7,87.0=>fb7,97.0=>"fc7",
 1579:                78.0=>fa8,88.0=>fb8,98.0=>"fc8",
 1580:                79.0=>fa9,89.0=>fb9,99.0=>"fc9",
 1581: 
 1582:                #{ one => small, map => key } => "small map key 1",
 1583:                #{ second => small, map => key } => "small map key 2",
 1584:                #{ third => small, map => key } => "small map key 3",
 1585: 
 1586:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1587:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1588:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1589:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1590:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1591: 
 1592:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1593:                   16=>a6,26=>b6,36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1594:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1595:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1596:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 1",
 1597: 
 1598:                #{ 10=>a0,20=>b0,30=>"c0","40"=>"d0",<<"50">>=>"e0",{["00"]}=>"10",
 1599:                   11=>a1,21=>b1,31=>"c1","41"=>"d1",<<"51">>=>"e1",{["01"]}=>"11",
 1600:                   12=>a2,22=>b2,32=>"c2","42"=>"d2",<<"52">>=>"e2",{["02"]}=>"12",
 1601:                   13=>a3,23=>b3,33=>"c3","43"=>"d3",<<"53">>=>"e3",{["03"]}=>"13",
 1602:                   14=>a4,24=>b4,34=>"c4","44"=>"d4",<<"54">>=>"e4",{["04"]}=>"14",
 1603: 
 1604:                   15=>a5,25=>b5,35=>"c5","45"=>"d5",<<"55">>=>"e5",{["05"]}=>"15",
 1605:                   k16=>a6,k26=>b6,k36=>"c6","46"=>"d6",<<"56">>=>"e6",{["06"]}=>"16",
 1606:                   17=>a7,27=>b7,37=>"c7","47"=>"d7",<<"57">>=>"e7",{["07"]}=>"17",
 1607:                   18=>a8,28=>b8,38=>"c8","48"=>"d8",<<"58">>=>"e8",{["08"]}=>"18",
 1608:                   19=>a9,29=>b9,39=>"c9","49"=>"d9",<<"59">>=>"e9",{["09"]}=>"19" } => "large map key 2" }),
 1609: 
 1610: 
 1611:     error  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{}),
 1612:     first  = map_guard_update(M0#{},M0#{x=>first}),
 1613:     second = map_guard_update(M0#{y=>old}, M0#{x=>second,y=>old}),
 1614:     ok.
 1615: 
 1616: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>first}  =:= M2 -> first;
 1617: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x=>second} =:= M2 -> second;
 1618: map_guard_update(M1, M2) when M1#{x:=third}  =:= M2 -> third;
 1619: map_guard_update(_, _) -> error.
 1620: 
 1621: bad_map_guard_update() ->
 1622:     do_bad_map_guard_update(fun burns/1),
 1623:     do_bad_map_guard_update(fun turns/1),
 1624:     ok.
 1625: 
 1626: do_bad_map_guard_update(Fun) ->
 1627:     do_bad_map_guard_update_1(Fun, #{}),
 1628:     do_bad_map_guard_update_1(Fun, #{true=>1}),
 1629:     ok.
 1630: 
 1631: do_bad_map_guard_update_1(Fun, Value) ->
 1632:     %% Note: The business with the seemingly redundant fun
 1633:     %% disables inlining, which would otherwise change the
 1634:     %% EXIT reason.
 1635:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch Fun(Value)),
 1636:     ok.
 1637: 
 1638: burns(Richmond) when not (Richmond#{true := 0}); [Richmond] ->
 1639:     specification.
 1640: 
 1641: turns(Richmond) when not (Richmond#{true => 0}); [Richmond] ->
 1642:     specification.
 1643: 
 1644: t_guard_receive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1645:     M0  = #{ id => 0 },
 1646:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> guard_receive_loop() end),
 1647:     Big = 36893488147419103229,
 1648:     B1  = <<"some text">>,
 1649:     B2  = <<"was appended">>,
 1650:     B3  = <<B1/binary, B2/binary>>,
 1651: 
 1652:     #{id:=1, res:=Big} = M1 = call(Pid, M0#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1653:     #{id:=2, res:=26}  = M2 = call(Pid, M1#{op=>idiv,in=>{53,2}}),
 1654:     #{id:=3, res:=832} = M3 = call(Pid, M2#{op=>imul,in=>{26,32}}),
 1655:     #{id:=4, res:=4}   = M4 = call(Pid, M3#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1656:     #{id:=5, res:=Big} = M5 = call(Pid, M4#{op=>sub,in=>{1 bsl 65, 3}}),
 1657:     #{id:=6, res:=B3}  = M6 = call(Pid, M5#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1658:     #{id:=7, res:=4}   = _  = call(Pid, M6#{op=>add,in=>{1,3}}),
 1659: 
 1660: 
 1661:     %% update old maps and check id update
 1662:     #{id:=2, res:=B3} = call(Pid, M1#{op=>"append",in=>{B1,B2}}),
 1663:     #{id:=5, res:=99} = call(Pid, M4#{op=>add,in=>{33, 66}}),
 1664: 
 1665:     %% cleanup
 1666:     done = call(Pid, done),
 1667:     ok.
 1668: 
 1669: -define(t_guard_receive_large_procs, 1500).
 1670: 
 1671: t_guard_receive_large(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1672:     M = lists:foldl(fun(_,#{procs := Ps } = M) ->
 1673:                             M#{ procs := Ps#{ spawn_link(fun() -> grecv_loop() end) => 0 }}
 1674:                     end, #{procs => #{}, done => 0}, lists:seq(1,?t_guard_receive_large_procs)),
 1675:     lists:foreach(fun(Pid) ->
 1676:                           Pid ! {self(), hello}
 1677:                   end, maps:keys(maps:get(procs,M))),
 1678:     ok = guard_receive_large_loop(M),
 1679:     ok.
 1680: 
 1681: guard_receive_large_loop(#{done := ?t_guard_receive_large_procs}) ->
 1682:     ok;
 1683: guard_receive_large_loop(M) ->
 1684:     receive
 1685:         #{pid := Pid, msg := hello} ->
 1686:             case M of
 1687:                 #{done := Count, procs := #{Pid := 150}} ->
 1688:                     Pid ! {self(), done},
 1689:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{done := Count + 1});
 1690:                 #{procs := #{Pid := Count} = Ps} ->
 1691:                     Pid ! {self(), hello},
 1692:                     guard_receive_large_loop(M#{procs := Ps#{Pid := Count + 1}})
 1693:             end
 1694:     end.
 1695: 
 1696: grecv_loop() ->
 1697:     receive
 1698:         {_, done} ->
 1699:             ok;
 1700:         {Pid, hello} ->
 1701:             Pid ! #{pid=>self(), msg=>hello},
 1702:             grecv_loop()
 1703:     end.
 1704: 
 1705: 
 1706: call(Pid, M) ->
 1707:     Pid ! {self(), M}, receive {Pid, Res} -> Res end.
 1708: 
 1709: guard_receive_loop() ->
 1710:     receive
 1711: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:="append", in:={X,Y}}=M} when is_binary(X), is_binary(Y) ->
 1712: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=><<X/binary,Y/binary>>}},
 1713: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1714: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=add, in:={X,Y}}} ->
 1715: 	    Pid ! {self(), #{ id=>Id+1, res=>X+Y}},
 1716: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1717: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=sub,  in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1718: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X-Y}},
 1719: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1720: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=idiv, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1721: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X div Y}},
 1722: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1723: 	{Pid, #{ id:=Id, op:=imul, in:={X,Y}}=M} ->
 1724: 	    Pid ! {self(), M#{ id=>Id+1, res=>X * Y}},
 1725: 	    guard_receive_loop();
 1726: 	{Pid, done} ->
 1727: 	    Pid ! {self(), done};
 1728: 	{Pid, Other} ->
 1729: 	    Pid ! {error, Other},
 1730: 	    guard_receive_loop()
 1731:     end.
 1732: 
 1733: 
 1734: t_list_comprehension(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1735:     [#{k:=1},#{k:=2},#{k:=3}] = id([#{k=>I} || I <- [1,2,3]]),
 1736:     Ls = id([#{<<2:301>> => I, "wat" => I + 1} || I <- [1,2,3]]),
 1737:     [#{<<2:301>>:=1,"wat":=2},#{<<2:301>>:=2,"wat":=3},#{<<2:301>>:=3,"wat":=4}] = Ls,
 1738:     [{1,2},{2,3},{3,4}] = id([{I2,I1} || #{"wat" := I1, <<2:301>> := I2} <- Ls]),
 1739: 
 1740:     Ks = lists:seq($a,$z),
 1741:     Ms = [#{[K1,K2]=>{K1,K2}} || K1 <- Ks, K2 <- Ks],
 1742:     [#{"aa" := {$a,$a}},#{"ab":={$a,$b}}|_] = Ms,
 1743:     [#{"zz" := {$z,$z}},#{"zy":={$z,$y}}|_] = lists:reverse(Ms),
 1744:     ok.
 1745: 
 1746: t_guard_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1747:     F1 = fun
 1748: 	    (#{s:=v,v:=V})     -> {v,V};
 1749: 	    (#{s:=t,v:={V,V}}) -> {t,V};
 1750: 	    (#{s:=l,v:=[V,V]}) -> {l,V}
 1751:     end,
 1752:     
 1753:     F2 = fun
 1754: 	    (#{s:=T,v:={V,V}}) -> {T,V};
 1755: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=[V,V]}) -> {T,V};
 1756: 	    (#{s:=T,v:=V})     -> {T,V}
 1757:     end,
 1758:     V = <<"hi">>,
 1759: 
 1760:     {v,V} = F1(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1761:     {t,V} = F1(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1762:     {l,V} = F1(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1763: 
 1764:     {v,V} = F2(#{s=>v,v=>V}),
 1765:     {t,V} = F2(#{s=>t,v=>{V,V}}),
 1766:     {l,V} = F2(#{s=>l,v=>[V,V]}),
 1767: 
 1768:     %% error case
 1769:     case (catch F1(#{s=>none,v=>none})) of
 1770: 	{'EXIT', {function_clause,[{?MODULE,_,[#{s:=none,v:=none}],_}|_]}} -> ok;
 1771: 	{'EXIT', {{case_clause,_},_}} -> {comment,inlined};
 1772: 	Other ->
 1773: 	    ct:fail({no_match, Other})
 1774:     end.
 1775: 
 1776: 
 1777: t_map_sort_literals(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1778:     % test relation
 1779: 
 1780:     %% size order
 1781:     true  = #{ a => 1, b => 2} < id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1782:     true  = #{ b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1, b => 1}),
 1783:     false = #{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1} < id(#{ c => 1, a => 1}),
 1784: 
 1785:     %% key order
 1786:     true  = id(#{ a => 1 }) < id(#{ b => 1}),
 1787:     false = id(#{ b => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1788:     true  = id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1 }) < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1789:     true  = id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1 }) > id(#{ a => 1, b => 1, c => 1}),
 1790:     true  = id(#{ c => 1, b => 1, a => 1 }) < id(#{ b => 1, c => 1, d => 1}),
 1791:     true  = id(#{ "a" => 1 }) < id(#{ <<"a">> => 1}),
 1792:     false = id(#{ <<"a">> => 1 }) < id(#{ "a" => 1}),
 1793:     true = id(#{ 1 => 1 }) < id(#{ 1.0 => 1}),
 1794:     false = id(#{ 1.0 => 1 }) < id(#{ 1 => 1}),
 1795: 
 1796:     %% value order
 1797:     true  = id(#{ a => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 2}),
 1798:     false = id(#{ a => 2 }) < id(#{ a => 1}),
 1799:     false = id(#{ a => 2, b => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1800:     true  = id(#{ a => 1, b => 1 }) < id(#{ a => 1, b => 3}),
 1801: 
 1802:     true  = id(#{ "a" => "hi", b => 134 }) == id(#{ b => 134,"a" => "hi"}),
 1803: 
 1804:     %% lists:sort
 1805: 
 1806:     SortVs = [#{"a"=>1},#{a=>2},#{1=>3},#{<<"a">>=>4}],
 1807:     [#{1:=ok},#{a:=ok},#{"a":=ok},#{<<"a">>:=ok}] = lists:sort([#{"a"=>ok},#{a=>ok},#{1=>ok},#{<<"a">>=>ok}]),
 1808:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(SortVs),
 1809:     [#{1:=3},#{a:=2},#{"a":=1},#{<<"a">>:=4}] = lists:sort(lists:reverse(SortVs)),
 1810: 
 1811:     ok.
 1812: 
 1813: t_warn_pair_key_overloaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1814:     #{ "hi1" := 42 } = id(#{ "hi1" => 1, "hi1" => 42 }),
 1815: 
 1816:     #{ "hi1" := 1337, "hi2" := [2], "hi3" := 3 } = id(#{
 1817: 	    "hi1" => erlang:atom_to_binary(?MODULE,utf8),
 1818: 	    "hi1" => erlang:binary_to_atom(<<"wazzup">>,utf8),
 1819: 	    "hi1" => erlang:binary_to_float(<<"3.1416">>),
 1820: 	    "hi1" => erlang:float_to_binary(3.1416),
 1821: 	    "hi2" => erlang:pid_to_list(self()),
 1822: 	    "hi3" => erlang:float_to_binary(3.1416),
 1823: 	    "hi2" => lists:subtract([1,2],[1]),
 1824: 	    "hi3" => +3,
 1825: 	    "hi1" => erlang:min(1,2),
 1826: 	    "hi1" => erlang:phash({1,2},33),
 1827: 	    "hi1" => erlang:phash2({1,2},34),
 1828: 	    "hi1" => erlang:integer_to_binary(1337),
 1829: 	    "hi1" => erlang:binary_to_integer(<<"1337">>),
 1830: 	    "hi4" => erlang:float_to_binary(3.1416)
 1831: 	}),
 1832:     ok.
 1833: 
 1834: t_warn_useless_build(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1835:     [#{ a => id(I)} || I <- [1,2,3]],
 1836:     ok.
 1837: 
 1838: t_build_and_match_over_alloc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1839:     Ls = id([1,2,3]),
 1840:     V0 = [a|Ls],
 1841:     M0 = id(#{ "a" => V0 }),
 1842:     #{ "a" := V1 } = M0,
 1843:     V2 = id([c|Ls]),
 1844:     M2 = id(#{ "a" => V2 }),
 1845:     #{ "a" := V3 } = M2,
 1846:     {[a,1,2,3],[c,1,2,3]} = id({V1,V3}),
 1847:     ok.
 1848: 
 1849: t_build_and_match_empty_val(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1850:     F = fun(#{ "hi":=_,{1,2}:=_,1337:=_}) -> ok end,
 1851:     ok = F(id(#{"hi"=>ok,{1,2}=>ok,1337=>ok})),
 1852: 
 1853:     %% error case
 1854:     case (catch (F(id(#{"hi"=>ok})))) of
 1855: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} -> ok;
 1856: 	{'EXIT', {{case_clause,_},_}} -> {comment,inlined};
 1857: 	Other ->
 1858: 	    ct:fail({no_match, Other})
 1859:     end.
 1860: 
 1861: t_build_and_match_val(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1862:     F = fun
 1863: 	(#{ "hi" := first,  v := V}) -> {1,V};
 1864: 	(#{ "hi" := second, v := V}) -> {2,V}
 1865:     end,
 1866: 
 1867: 
 1868:     {1,"hello"}  = F(id(#{"hi"=>first,v=>"hello"})),
 1869:     {2,"second"} = F(id(#{"hi"=>second,v=>"second"})),
 1870: 
 1871:     %% error case
 1872:     case (catch (F(id(#{"hi"=>ok})))) of
 1873: 	{'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} -> ok;
 1874: 	{'EXIT', {{case_clause,_},_}} -> {comment,inlined};
 1875: 	Other ->
 1876: 	    ct:fail({no_match, Other})
 1877:     end.
 1878: 
 1879: t_build_and_match_nil(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1880:     %% literals removed the coverage
 1881:     V1 = id(cookie),
 1882:     V2 = id(cake),
 1883:     V3 = id(crisps),
 1884: 
 1885:     #{ [] := V1, "treat" := V2, {your,treat} := V3 } = id(#{
 1886: 	    {your,treat} => V3,
 1887: 	    "treat" => V2, 
 1888: 	    [] => V1 }),
 1889:     #{ [] := V3, [] := V3 } = id(#{ [] => V1, [] => V3 }),
 1890:     #{ <<1>> := V3, [] := V1 } = id(#{ [] => V1, <<1>> => V3 }),
 1891:     ok.
 1892: 
 1893: t_build_and_match_structure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1894:     V2 = id("it"),
 1895:     S = id([42,{"hi", "=)", #{ "a" => 42, any => any, val => "get_" ++ V2}}]),
 1896: 
 1897:     %% match deep map values
 1898:     V2 = case S of
 1899: 	[42,{"hi",_, #{ "a" := 42, val := "get_" ++ V1, any := _ }}] -> V1
 1900:     end,
 1901:     %% match deep map
 1902:     ok = case S of
 1903: 	[42,{"hi",_, #{ }}] -> ok
 1904:     end,
 1905:     ok.
 1906: 
 1907: %% simple build and match variables
 1908: t_build_and_match_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1909:     K0 = id(#{}),
 1910:     K1 = id(1),       V1 = id(a),
 1911:     K2 = id(2),       V2 = id(b),
 1912:     K3 = id(3),       V3 = id("c"),
 1913:     K4 = id("4"),     V4 = id("d"),
 1914:     K5 = id(<<"5">>), V5 = id(<<"e">>),
 1915:     K6 = id({"6",7}), V6 = id("f"),
 1916:     K7 = id(#{ "a" => 3 }),
 1917:     #{K1:=V1} = id(#{K1=>V1}),
 1918:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2}),
 1919:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3}),
 1920:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3,K4:=V4} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3,K4=>V4}),
 1921:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3,K4:=V4,K5:=V5} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3,K4=>V4,K5=>V5}),
 1922:     #{K1:=V1,K2:=V2,K3:=V3,K4:=V4,K5:=V5,K6:=V6} = id(#{K1=>V1,K2=>V2,K3=>V3,K4=>V4,K5=>V5,K6=>V6}),
 1923: 
 1924:     #{K5:=X,K5:=X=3,K4:=4} = id(#{K5=>3,K4=>4}),
 1925:     #{K5:=X,<<"5">>:=X=3,K4:=4} = id(#{K5=>3,K4=>4}),
 1926:     #{K5:=X,<<"5">>:=X=3,K4:=4} = id(#{<<"5">>=>3,K4=>4}),
 1927: 
 1928:     #{ K4:=#{ K3:=#{K1:=V1, K2:=V2}}, K5:=V5} =
 1929: 	id(#{ K5=>V5, K4=>#{ K3=>#{K2 => V2, K1 => V1}}}),
 1930:     #{ K4 := #{ K5 := Res }, K6 := Res} = id(#{K4=>#{K5 => 99}, K6 => 99}),
 1931: 
 1932:     %% has keys
 1933:     #{a :=_,b :=_,K1:=_,K2:=_,K3:=V3,K4:=ResKey,K4:=ResKey,"4":=ResKey,"4":="ok"} =
 1934: 	id(#{ a=>1, b=>1, K1=>V1, K2=>V2, K3=>V3, K4=>"nope", "4"=>"ok" }),
 1935: 
 1936:     %% function
 1937:     ok = match_function_map_neg_keys(#{ -1 => a, -2 => b, -3 => c }),
 1938: 
 1939:     %% map key
 1940:     #{ K0 := 42 } = id(#{ K0 => 42 }),
 1941:     #{ K7 := 42 } = id(#{ K7 => 42 }),
 1942: 
 1943:     %% nil key
 1944:     KNIL = id([]),
 1945:     #{KNIL:=ok,1:=2} = id(#{KNIL=>ok,1=>2}),
 1946: 
 1947:     Bin = <<0:258>>,
 1948:     #{ Bin := "three" } = id(#{<<0:258>> =>"three"}),
 1949: 
 1950:     %% error case
 1951:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3,x:=2} = id(#{K5=>3}))),
 1952:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=2} = id(#{K5=>3}))),
 1953:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3} = id({a,b,c}))),
 1954:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3} = id(#{K6=>3}))),
 1955:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K5:=3} = id(K7))),
 1956:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,_},_}} = (catch (#{K7:=3} = id(#{K7=>42}))),
 1957:     ok.
 1958: 
 1959: 
 1960: match_function_map_neg_keys(#{ -1 := a, -2 := b, -3 := c }) -> ok.
 1961: 
 1962: t_update_assoc_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1963:     K1 = id(1),
 1964:     K2 = id(2),
 1965:     K3 = id(3.0),
 1966:     K4 = id(4),
 1967:     K5 = id(5),
 1968:     K6 = id(2.0),
 1969: 
 1970:     M0 = #{K1=>a,K2=>b,K3=>c,K4=>d,K5=>e},
 1971: 
 1972:     M1 = M0#{K1=>42,K2=>100,K4=>[a,b,c]},
 1973:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1974:     #{1:=42,2:=b,4:=d,5:=e,2.0:=100,K3:=c,4.0:=[a,b,c]} = M0#{1.0=>float,1:=42,2.0=>wrong,K6=>100,4.0=>[a,b,c]},
 1975: 
 1976:     M2 = M0#{K3=>new},
 1977:     #{1:=a,2:=b,K3:=new,4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 1978:     M2 = M0#{3.0:=wrong,K3=>new},
 1979: 
 1980:     #{ <<0:258>> := val } = id(M0#{<<0:258>> => val}), %% binary limitation
 1981: 
 1982:     %% Errors cases.
 1983:     BadMap = id(badmap),
 1984:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,BadMap},_}} = (catch BadMap#{nonexisting=>val}),
 1985:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch <<>>#{nonexisting=>val}),
 1986:     ok.
 1987: 
 1988: t_update_exact_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1989:     K1 = id(1),
 1990:     K2 = id(2),
 1991:     K3 = id(3.0),
 1992:     K4 = id(4),
 1993: 
 1994:     M0 = id(#{1=>a,2=>b,3.0=>c,4=>d,5=>e}),
 1995: 
 1996:     M1 = M0#{K1:=42,K2:=100,K4:=[a,b,c]},
 1997:     #{1:=42,2:=100,3.0:=c,K4:=[a,b,c],5:=e} = M1,
 1998:     M1 = M0#{K1:=wrong,1:=also_wrong,K1=>42,2=>wrong,K2:=100,4:=[a,b,c]},
 1999: 
 2000:     M2 = M0#{K3:=new},
 2001:     #{1:=a,K2:=b,3.0:=new,K4:=d,5:=e} = M2,
 2002:     M2 = M0#{3.0=>wrong,K3:=new},
 2003:     true = M2 =/= M0#{3=>right,3.0:=new},
 2004:     #{ 3 := right, 3.0 := new } = M0#{3=>right,K3:=new},
 2005: 
 2006:     M3 = id(#{ 1 => val}),
 2007:     #{1 := update2,1.0 := new_val4} = M3#{
 2008: 	1.0 => new_val1, K1 := update, K1=> update3,
 2009: 	K1 := update2, 1.0 := new_val2, 1.0 => new_val3,
 2010: 	1.0 => new_val4 },
 2011: 
 2012:     #{ "wat" := 3, 2 := a } = id(#{ "wat" => 1, K2 => 2 }#{ K2 := a, "wat" := 3 }),
 2013: 
 2014:     %% Errors cases.
 2015:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,nil},_}} = (catch ((id(nil))#{ a := b })),
 2016:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,nonexisting},_}} = (catch M0#{nonexisting:=val}),
 2017:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,1.0},_}} = (catch M0#{1.0:=v,1.0=>v2}),
 2018:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42},_}} = (catch M0#{42.0:=v,42:=v2}),
 2019:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,42.0},_}} = (catch M0#{42=>v1,42.0:=v2,42:=v3}),
 2020:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,<<>>},_}} = (catch <<>>#{nonexisting:=val}),
 2021:     {'EXIT',{{badkey,<<0:257>>},_}} =
 2022: 	(catch M0#{<<0:257>> := val}),		%limitation
 2023:     ok.
 2024: 
 2025: t_nested_pattern_expressions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2026:     K1 = id("hello"),
 2027:     %K2 = id({ok}),
 2028:     [_,_,#{ <<"hi">> := wat, K1 := 42 }|_] = id([k,k,#{<<"hi">> => wat, K1 => 42}]),
 2029:     [_,_,#{ -1 := wat, K1 := 42 }|_] = id([k,k,#{-1 => wat, K1 => 42}]),
 2030:     [_,_,{#{ -1 := #{ {-3,<<0:300>>} := V1 }, K1 := 42 },3}|_] = id([k,k,{#{-1 => #{{-3,<<0:300>>}=>"hi"}, K1 => 42},3}]),
 2031:     "hi" = V1,
 2032:     %[k,#{ {-1,K1,[]} := {wat,K1}, K2 := 42 }|_] = id([k,#{{-1,K1,[]} => {wat,K1}, K2 => 42}]),
 2033:     %[k,#{ [-1,K2,[]] := {wat,K1}, K1 := 42 }|_] = id([k,#{[-1,K2,[]] => {wat,K1}, K1 => 42}]),
 2034: 
 2035:     M0 = id(#{ <<33:333>> => 1, <<332:333>> => ok, a => ok, wat => yep, watzor => ok }),
 2036:     F0 = map_nested_pattern_funs(M0),
 2037:     F1 = F0(wat),
 2038:     F2 = F1(watzor),
 2039:     {yep,ok} = F2(M0),
 2040: 
 2041:     %% Test matching of nested maps. There used to be an unsafe optimization in beam_peep.
 2042:     #{ <<"result">> := #{<<"foo">> := <<"6">> } } =
 2043:         nested_map(),
 2044: 
 2045:     InnerMap = #{a => id({a,value})},
 2046:     OuterMap = #{inner_map => InnerMap},
 2047:     #{inner_map := #{a := {a,value}}} = OuterMap,
 2048: 
 2049:     ok.
 2050: 
 2051: map_nested_pattern_funs(M) ->
 2052:     K0 = id(a),
 2053:     fun(K1) ->
 2054: 	    case M of
 2055: 		#{ K0 := ok, K1 := yep, <<33:333>> := 1 } ->
 2056: 		    fun(K2) ->
 2057: 			    case M of
 2058: 				#{ K2 := ok, K1 := yep, <<33:333>> := 1 } ->
 2059: 				    fun
 2060: 					(#{ <<332:333>> := ok, K1 := V1, K2 := V2 }) ->
 2061: 					    {V1,V2}
 2062: 				    end
 2063: 			    end
 2064: 		    end
 2065: 	    end
 2066:     end.
 2067: 
 2068: nested_map() ->
 2069:     #{ <<"result">> := #{<<"foo">> := <<"6">> } } =
 2070:         #{ <<"result">> => #{<<"foo">> => <<"6">> } }.
 2071: 
 2072: t_guard_update_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2073:     error  = map_guard_update_variables(n,#{},#{}),
 2074:     first  = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{}, #{x=>first}),
 2075:     second = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{y=>old}, #{x=>second,y=>old}),
 2076:     third  = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{x=>old,y=>old}, #{x=>third,y=>old}),
 2077:     fourth = map_guard_update_variables(x,#{x=>old,y=>old}, #{x=>4,y=>new}),
 2078:     ok.
 2079: 
 2080: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K=>first}    =:= M2 -> first;
 2081: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K=>second}   =:= M2 -> second;
 2082: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K:=third}    =:= M2 -> third;
 2083: map_guard_update_variables(K,M1,M2) when M1#{K:=4,y=>new} =:= M2 -> fourth;
 2084: map_guard_update_variables(_,_,_) -> error.
 2085: 
 2086: t_guard_sequence_variables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2087:     {1,"a"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(a,#{seq=>1,a=>id("a"),b=>no}),
 2088:     {2,"b"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(b,#{seq=>2,b=>id("b"),a=>no}),
 2089:     {3,"c"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(a,#{seq=>3,a=>id("c"),b=>no}),
 2090:     {4,"d"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(b,#{seq=>4,b=>id("d"),a=>no}),
 2091:     {4,4}   = map_guard_sequence_var_1(seq,#{seq=>4}),
 2092:     {4,4,y} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(seq,#{seq=>4,b=>id("d"),a=>y}),
 2093:     {5,"d"} = map_guard_sequence_var_1(b,#{seq=>5,b=>id("d"),a=>y}),
 2094: 
 2095:     %% error case
 2096:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,_},_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_var_1("a",#{seq=>4,val=>id("e")})),
 2097:     ok.
 2098: 
 2099: 
 2100: map_guard_sequence_var_1(K,M) ->
 2101:     case M of
 2102: 	#{seq:=1=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2103: 	#{seq:=2=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2104: 	#{seq:=3=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2105: 	#{K:=4=Seq,   K:=Val1,a:=Val2} -> {Seq,Val1,Val2};
 2106: 	#{seq:=4=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2107: 	#{K:=4=Seq,   K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val};
 2108: 	#{seq:=5=Seq, K:=Val} -> {Seq,Val}
 2109:     end.
 2110: 
 2111: 
 2112: t_guard_sequence_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2113:     M0 = id(#{ a=>1, b=>1, c=>1, d=>1, e=>1, f=>1, g=>1, h=>1 }),
 2114:     M1 = id(M0#{ d := 3 }),
 2115:     1 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,d,M1),
 2116:     M2 = id(M1#{ b := 2, d := 4, h := 2 }),
 2117:     2 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,d,M2),
 2118:     M3 = id(M2#{ b := 3, e := 5, g := 3 }),
 2119:     3 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,e,M3),
 2120:     M4 = id(M3#{ c := 4, e := 6, h := 1 }),
 2121:     4 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,e,M4),
 2122:     M5 = id(M4#{ c := 5, f := 7, g := 2 }),
 2123:     5 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,f,M5),
 2124:     M6 = id(M5#{ c := 6, f := 8, h := 3 }),
 2125:     6 = map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,f,M6),
 2126: 
 2127:     %% error case
 2128:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,_},_}} = (catch map_guard_sequence_mixed(a,b,M0)),
 2129:     ok.
 2130: 
 2131: map_guard_sequence_mixed(K1,K2,M) ->
 2132:     case M of
 2133: 	#{ K1 := 1, b := 1, K2 := 3, g := 1} -> 1;
 2134: 	#{ K1 := 1, b := 2, K2 := 4, h := 2} -> 2;
 2135: 	#{ K1 := 1, b := 3, K2 := 5, g := 3} -> 3;
 2136: 	#{ K1 := 1, c := 4, K2 := 6, h := 1} -> 4;
 2137: 	#{ K1 := 1, c := 5, K2 := 7, g := 2} -> 5;
 2138: 	#{ K1 := 1, c := 6, K2 := 8, h := 3} -> 6
 2139:     end.
 2140: 
 2141: %% register corruption discovered in 18 due to
 2142: %% get_map_elements might destroys registers when fail-label is taken.
 2143: %% Only seen when patterns have two targets,
 2144: %% specifically: we copy one register, and then jump.
 2145: %%    {test,is_map,{f,5},[{x,1}]}.
 2146: %%
 2147: %%    {get_map_elements,{f,7},{x,1},{list,[{atom,a},{x,1},{atom,b},{x,2}]}}.
 2148: %%    %% if 'a' exists but not 'b' {x,1} is overwritten, jump {f,7}
 2149: %%
 2150: %%    {move,{integer,1},{x,0}}.
 2151: %%    {call_only,3,{f,10}}.
 2152: %%
 2153: %%  {label,7}.
 2154: %%    {get_map_elements,{f,8},{x,1},{list,[{atom,b},{x,2}]}}.
 2155: %%    %% {x,1} (src) is now corrupt
 2156: %%
 2157: %%    {move,{x,0},{x,1}}.
 2158: %%    {move,{integer,2},{x,0}}.
 2159: %%    {call_only,3,{f,10}}.
 2160: %%
 2161: %% Only happens in beam_block opt_move pass with two destinations.
 2162: 
 2163: t_register_corruption(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2164:     M = #{a=> <<"value">>, c=>3},
 2165:     {3,wanted,<<"value">>} = register_corruption_bar(M,wanted),
 2166:     {3,wanted,<<"value">>} = register_corruption_foo(wanted,M),
 2167:     ok.
 2168: 
 2169: register_corruption_foo(_,#{a := V1, b := V2}) ->
 2170:     register_corruption_dummy_call(1,V1,V2);
 2171: register_corruption_foo(A,#{b := V}) ->
 2172:     register_corruption_dummy_call(2,A,V);
 2173: register_corruption_foo(A,#{a := V}) ->
 2174:     register_corruption_dummy_call(3,A,V).
 2175: 
 2176: register_corruption_bar(M,A) ->
 2177:     case M of
 2178:         #{a := V1, b := V2} ->
 2179:             register_corruption_dummy_call(1,V1,V2);
 2180:         #{b := V} ->
 2181:             register_corruption_dummy_call(2,A,V);
 2182:         #{a := V} ->
 2183:             register_corruption_dummy_call(3,A,V)
 2184:     end.
 2185: 
 2186: 
 2187: register_corruption_dummy_call(A,B,C) -> {A,B,C}.
 2188: 
 2189: 
 2190: t_frequency_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2191:     rand:seed(exsplus, {13,1337,54}),		% pseudo random
 2192:     N = 100000,
 2193:     Ts = rand_terms(N),
 2194:     #{ n:=N, tf := Tf } = frequency_table(Ts,#{ n=>0, tf => #{}}),
 2195:     ok = check_frequency(Ts,Tf),
 2196:     ok.
 2197: 
 2198: 
 2199: frequency_table([T|Ts], M) ->
 2200:     case M of
 2201: 	#{ n := N, tf := #{ T := C } = F } ->
 2202: 	    frequency_table(Ts,M#{ n := N + 1, tf := F#{ T := C + 1 }});
 2203: 	#{ n := N, tf := F } ->
 2204: 	    frequency_table(Ts,M#{ n := N + 1, tf := F#{ T => 1 }})
 2205:     end;
 2206: frequency_table([], M) -> M.
 2207: 
 2208: 
 2209: check_frequency(Ts,Tf) ->
 2210:     check_frequency(Ts,Tf,dict:new()).
 2211: 
 2212: check_frequency([T|Ts],Tf,D) ->
 2213:     case dict:find(T,D) of
 2214: 	error  -> check_frequency(Ts,Tf,dict:store(T,1,D));
 2215: 	{ok,C} -> check_frequency(Ts,Tf,dict:store(T,C+1,D))
 2216:     end;
 2217: check_frequency([],Tf,D) ->
 2218:     validate_frequency(dict:to_list(D),Tf).
 2219: 
 2220: validate_frequency([{T,C}|Fs],Tf) ->
 2221:     case Tf of
 2222: 	#{ T := C } -> validate_frequency(Fs,Tf);
 2223: 	_ -> error
 2224:     end;
 2225: validate_frequency([], _) -> ok.
 2226: 
 2227: 
 2228: t_bad_update(_Config) ->
 2229:     {#{0.0:=Id},#{}} = properly(#{}),
 2230:     42 = Id(42),
 2231:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,_},_}} = (catch increase(0)),
 2232:     ok.
 2233: 
 2234: properly(Item) ->
 2235:     {Item#{0.0 => fun id/1},Item}.
 2236: 
 2237: increase(Allows) ->
 2238:     catch fun() -> Allows end#{[] => +Allows, "warranty" => fun id/1}.
 2239: 
 2240: t_reused_key_variable(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2241:     Key = id(key),
 2242:     Map1 = id(#{Key=>Config}),
 2243:     Map2 = id(#{Key=>Config}),
 2244:     case {Map1,Map2} of
 2245:         %% core_lint treated Key as pattern variables, not input variables,
 2246:         %% and complained about the variable being duplicated.
 2247:         {#{Key:=Same},#{Key:=Same}} ->
 2248:             ok
 2249:     end.
 2250: 
 2251: t_mixed_clause(_Config) ->
 2252:     put(fool_inliner, x),
 2253:     K = get(fool_inliner),
 2254:     {42,100} = case #{K=>42,y=>100} of
 2255:                    #{x:=X,y:=Y} ->
 2256:                        {X,Y}
 2257:                end,
 2258:     nomatch = case #{K=>42,y=>100} of
 2259:                   #{x:=X,y:=0} ->
 2260:                       {X,Y};
 2261:                   #{} ->
 2262:                       nomatch
 2263:               end,
 2264:     ok.
 2265: 
 2266: cover_beam_trim(_Config) ->
 2267:     val = do_cover_beam_trim(id, max, max, id, #{id=>val}),
 2268:     ok.
 2269: 
 2270: do_cover_beam_trim(Id, OldMax, Max, Id, M) ->
 2271:     OldMax = id(Max),
 2272:     #{Id:=Val} = id(M),
 2273:     Val.
 2274: 
 2275: t_key_expressions(_Config) ->
 2276:     Int = id(42),
 2277:     #{{tag,Int} := 42} = id(#{{tag,Int} => 42}),
 2278:     #{{tag,Int+1} := 42} = id(#{{tag,Int+1} => 42}),
 2279:     #{{a,b} := x, {tag,Int} := 42, Int := 0} =
 2280:         id(#{{a,b} => x, {tag,Int} => 42, Int => 0}),
 2281: 
 2282:     F1 = fun(#{Int + 1 := Val}) -> Val end,
 2283:     val = F1(#{43 => val}),
 2284:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch F1(a)),
 2285: 
 2286:     F2 = fun(M, X, Y) ->
 2287:                  case M of
 2288:                      #{element(X, Y) := <<Sz:16,Bin:Sz/binary>>} ->
 2289:                          Bin;
 2290:                      #{} ->
 2291:                          not_found;
 2292:                      {A,B} ->
 2293:                          A + B
 2294:                  end
 2295:          end,
 2296:     <<"xyz">> = F2(#{b => <<3:16,"xyz">>}, 2, {a,b,c}),
 2297:     not_found = F2(#{b => <<3:16,"xyz">>}, 999, {a,b,c}),
 2298:     13 = F2({6,7}, 1, 2),
 2299: 
 2300:     #{<<"Спутник"/utf8>> := 1} = id(#{<<"Спутник"/utf8>> => 1}),
 2301: 
 2302:     F3 = fun(Arg) ->
 2303:                  erase(once),
 2304:                  RunOnce = fun(I) ->
 2305:                                    undefined = put(once, twice),
 2306:                                    id(I)
 2307:                            end,
 2308:                  case RunOnce(Arg) of
 2309:                      #{{tag,<<Int:42>>} := Value} -> Value;
 2310:                      {X,Y} -> X + Y
 2311:                  end
 2312:          end,
 2313:     10 = F3({7,3}),
 2314:     whatever = F3(#{{tag,<<Int:42>>} => whatever}),
 2315: 
 2316:     F4 = fun(K1, K2, M) ->
 2317:                  case M of
 2318:                      #{K1 div K2 := V} -> V;
 2319:                      #{} -> no_match
 2320:                  end
 2321:          end,
 2322:     value = F4(42, 21, #{2 => value}),
 2323:     no_match = F4(42, 21, #{}),
 2324:     no_match = F4(42, 0, #{2 => value}),
 2325:     no_match = F4(42, a, #{2 => value}),
 2326: 
 2327:     F5 = fun(Term) ->
 2328:                  self() ! Term,
 2329:                  receive
 2330:                      #{[<<(3 bsr 30 + 2):0,$k:[]/signed-integer>>] := _} ->
 2331:                          ok;
 2332:                      0.5 ->
 2333:                          error
 2334:                  end
 2335:          end,
 2336:     error = F5(0.5),
 2337: 
 2338:     F6 = fun(Term) ->
 2339:                  self() ! Term,
 2340:                  receive
 2341:                      #{<<a/utf8>> := {a,b,c}} -> ok;
 2342:                      Other -> {error,Other}
 2343:                  end
 2344:          end,
 2345:     {error,any} = F6(any),
 2346: 
 2347:     F7 = fun(Term) ->
 2348:                  self() ! Term,
 2349:                  (?MODULE:all()):a(catch
 2350:                                        receive
 2351:                                            <<1.14:{<<"a":(tuple_size(1))>>}>> ->
 2352:                                                4;
 2353:                                            Other ->
 2354:                                                Other
 2355:                                        end)
 2356:          end,
 2357:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch F7(whatever)),
 2358: 
 2359:     ok.
 2360: 
 2361: t_duplicate_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2362:     Map = #{ gurka => gaffel },
 2363:     Map = dup_keys_1(id(Map)),
 2364: 
 2365:     ok = dup_keys_1(#{ '__struct__' => ok }),
 2366: 
 2367:     ok.
 2368: 
 2369: dup_keys_1(Map) ->
 2370:     case Map of
 2371:         #{'__struct__' := _} ->
 2372:             case Map of
 2373:                 #{'__struct__' := _} ->
 2374:                     ok;
 2375:                 O1 ->
 2376:                     O1
 2377:             end;
 2378:         O2 ->
 2379:             O2
 2380:     end.
 2381: 
 2382: t_fold_3(_Config) ->
 2383:     Vs = lists:seq(1, 200),
 2384:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I} || I<-Vs]),
 2385:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
 2386:     Tot0 = lists:sum(Vs),
 2387:     Tot1 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, M0),
 2388:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot1,
 2389:     Tot2 = maps:fold(fun({k,_},V,A) -> A + V end, 0, maps:iterator(M0)),
 2390:     true = Tot0 =:= Tot2,
 2391: 
 2392:     %% error case
 2393:     ?badmap(a, fold, [_,0,a]) = catch maps:fold(fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, 0, id(a)),
 2394:     ?badarg(fold, [<<>>,0,#{}]) = catch maps:fold(id(<<>>),0,#{}),
 2395:     ok.
 2396: 
 2397: t_from_keys(_Config) ->
 2398:     Map0 = maps:from_keys(["a", 2, {three}], value),
 2399:     3 = map_size(Map0),
 2400:     #{"a":=value,2:=value,{three}:=value} = Map0,
 2401: 
 2402:     Map1 = maps:from_keys([1, 2, 2], {complex,value}),
 2403:     2 = map_size(Map1),
 2404:     #{1:={complex,value},2:={complex,value}} = Map1,
 2405: 
 2406:     Map2 = maps:from_keys([], value),
 2407:     0 = map_size(Map2),
 2408: 
 2409:     ?badarg(from_keys, [[a|b],value]) = catch maps:from_keys([a|b], value),
 2410:     ?badarg(from_keys, [not_list,value]) = catch maps:from_keys(not_list, value),
 2411:     ok.
 2412: 
 2413: t_map_2(_Config) ->
 2414:     Vs = lists:seq(1,200),
 2415:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},I}||I<-Vs]),
 2416:     #{ {k,1} := 1, {k,200} := 200} = M0,
 2417:     M1 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, M0),
 2418:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M1,
 2419:     M2 = maps:map(fun({k,_},V) -> V + 42 end, maps:iterator(M0)),
 2420:     #{ {k,1} := 43, {k,200} := 242} = M2,
 2421: 
 2422:     %% error case
 2423:     ?badmap(a, map, [_,a]) = catch maps:map(fun(_,_) -> ok end, id(a)),
 2424:     ?badarg(map, [<<>>,#{}]) = catch maps:map(id(<<>>), #{}),
 2425:     ok.
 2426: 
 2427: t_maps_take_2(_Config) ->
 2428:     {yes,Map0} = maps:take(a, #{a => yes, b => no}),
 2429:     true = Map0 =:= #{b => no},
 2430: 
 2431:     error = maps:take(a, #{b => no}),
 2432: 
 2433:     NotMap = not_map(b),
 2434:     {'EXIT',{{badmap,b},_}} = catch maps:take(a, b),
 2435: 
 2436:     ok.
 2437: 
 2438: not_map(Term) -> Term.
 2439: 
 2440: t_update_with_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2441:     V1 = value1,
 2442:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
 2443:     V3 = "value3",
 2444:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
 2445:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
 2446: 
 2447:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1, Fun, Map),
 2448:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2, Fun, Map),
 2449:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3", Fun, Map),
 2450: 
 2451:     %% error case
 2452:     ?badmap(b, update_with, [[a,b],a,b]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], id(a), b),
 2453:     ?badarg(update_with, [[a,b],a,#{}]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], id(a), #{}),
 2454:     ?badkey([a,b], update_with, [[a,b],Fun,#{}]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], Fun,#{}),
 2455:     ok.
 2456: 
 2457: t_update_with_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2458:     V1 = value1,
 2459:     V2 = <<"value2">>,
 2460:     V3 = "value3",
 2461:     Map = #{ key1 => V1, key2 => V2, "key3" => V3 },
 2462:     Fun = fun(V) -> [V,V,{V,V}] end,
 2463:     Init = 3,
 2464: 
 2465:     #{ key1 := [V1,V1,{V1,V1}] } = maps:update_with(key1, Fun, Init, Map),
 2466:     #{ key2 := [V2,V2,{V2,V2}] } = maps:update_with(key2, Fun, Init, Map),
 2467:     #{ "key3" := [V3,V3,{V3,V3}] } = maps:update_with("key3", Fun, Init, Map),
 2468: 
 2469:     #{ key3 := Init } = maps:update_with(key3, Fun, Init, Map),
 2470: 
 2471:     %% error case
 2472:     ?badmap(b, update_with, [[a,b],a,b]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b],id(a), b),
 2473:     ?badarg(update_with, [[a,b],a,#{}]) = catch maps:update_with([a,b], id(a), #{}),
 2474:     ok.
 2475: 
 2476: t_with_2(_Config) ->
 2477:     Ki = [11,22,33,44,55,66,77,88,99],
 2478:     M0 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}} || I <- lists:seq(1, 100)]),
 2479:     M1 = maps:from_list([{{k,I},{v,I}} || I <- Ki]),
 2480:     M1 = maps:with([{k,I} || I <- Ki], M0),
 2481: 
 2482:     %% error case
 2483:     ?badmap(a, with, [[a,b],a]) = catch maps:with([a,b], id(a)),
 2484:     ?badmap(a, with, [{a,b},a]) = catch maps:with({a,b}, id(a)),
 2485:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97}, with, [[],{0,<<>>,97}]) = catch maps:with([], {0,<<>>,97}),
 2486:     ?badmap({0,<<>>,97}, with, [[false, -20, -8],{0,<<>>,97}]) = catch maps:with([false, -20, -8], {0, <<>>, 97}),
 2487:     ?badarg(with, [a,#{}]) = catch maps:with(a,#{}),
 2488:     ok.
 2489: 
 2490: t_bif_map_find(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2491:     {ok, 1}     = maps:find(a, #{ a=> 1}),
 2492:     {ok, 2}     = maps:find(b, #{ a=> 1, b => 2}),
 2493:     {ok, "int"} = maps:find(1, #{ 1   => "int"}),
 2494:     {ok, "float"} = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1.0=> "float"}),
 2495: 
 2496:     {ok, "hi"} = maps:find("hello", #{ a=>1, "hello" => "hi"}),
 2497:     {ok, "tuple hi"} = maps:find({1,1.0}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}),
 2498: 
 2499:     M0 = id(#{ k1=>"v1", <<"k2">> => <<"v3">> }),
 2500:     {ok, "v4"} = maps:find(<<"k2">>, M0#{ <<"k2">> => "v4" }),
 2501: 
 2502: 
 2503:     %% error case
 2504:     error = maps:find(a, #{}),
 2505:     error = maps:find(a, #{b=>1, c=>2}),
 2506:     error = maps:find(1.0, #{ 1 => "int"}),
 2507:     error = maps:find(1, #{ 1.0  => "float"}),
 2508:     error = maps:find({1.0,1}, #{ a=>a, {1,1.0} => "tuple hi"}), % reverse types in tuple key
 2509: 
 2510:     do_badmap(fun(T) ->
 2511: 		      {'EXIT',{{badmap,T},[{maps,find,_,_}|_]}} =
 2512: 			  catch maps:find(a, T)
 2513: 	      end),
 2514:     ok.
 2515: 
 2516: t_conflicting_destinations(_Config) ->
 2517:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
 2518:         catch do_conflicts(#{{tag,whatever} => true}),
 2519:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
 2520:         catch do_conflicts(#{[something] => 42}),
 2521:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
 2522:         catch do_conflicts(#{{tag,whatever} => true,
 2523:                              #{} => <<0>>,
 2524:                              [something] => 42}),
 2525:     ok.
 2526: 
 2527: do_conflicts(#{{tag,whatever} := true,
 2528:                #{} := <<bad_integer,0:(is_integer(a))>>} =
 2529:                  #{[something] := 42}) ->
 2530:     ok.
 2531: 
 2532: t_cse_assoc(_Config) ->
 2533:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,#{key:=any}},_}} = catch do_cse_assoc(id(any)),
 2534: 
 2535:     {'EXIT',{{case_clause,#{key:=value}},_}} = catch do_cse_assoc(id(#{}), id(value)),
 2536:     42 = do_cse_assoc(id(#{assoc => 42}), id(any)),
 2537: 
 2538:     ok.
 2539: 
 2540: do_cse_assoc(V) ->
 2541:     case #{key => V} of
 2542:         #{assoc := Assoc} ->
 2543:             %% The CSE optimization would consider the first two arguments in
 2544:             %% the argument for `put_map` to be the key `alloc` and the value
 2545:             %% `#{}`.
 2546:             Assoc
 2547:     end.
 2548: 
 2549: do_cse_assoc(M, V) ->
 2550:     case M#{key => V} of
 2551:         #{assoc := Assoc} ->
 2552:             Assoc
 2553:     end.
 2554: 
 2555: shared_key_tuples(_Config) ->
 2556:     A = decimal(0),
 2557:     B = decimal(1),
 2558: 
 2559:     case ?MODULE of
 2560:         map_inline_SUITE ->
 2561:             %% With inlining, two separate map literals will be created. They
 2562:             %% will not share keys.
 2563:             ok;
 2564:         _ ->
 2565:             %% The two instances should share the key tuple.
 2566:             true = erts_debug:same(erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(A),
 2567:                                    erts_internal:map_to_tuple_keys(B))
 2568:     end,
 2569:     ok.
 2570: 
 2571: decimal(Int) ->
 2572:     #{type => decimal, int => Int, exp => 0}.
 2573: 
 2574: %% GH-6348/OTP-18297: Extend parallel matching of maps.
 2575: map_aliases(_Config) ->
 2576:     F1 = fun(M) ->
 2577:                  #{K := V} = #{k := {a,K}} = M,
 2578:                  V
 2579:          end,
 2580:     value = F1(id(#{k => {a,key}, key => value})),
 2581: 
 2582:     F2 = fun(#{} = #{}) -> ok end,
 2583:     ok = F2(id(#{})),
 2584:     ok = F2(id(#{key => whatever})),
 2585: 
 2586:     F3 = fun(#{a := V} = #{}) -> V end,
 2587:     {a,b,c} = F3(id(#{a => {a,b,c}})),
 2588: 
 2589:     F4 = fun(Map) ->
 2590:                  [#{Key := Value} | _] = [_ | Key] = id(Map),
 2591:                  Value
 2592:          end,
 2593:     bar = F4([#{foo => bar} | foo]),
 2594: 
 2595:     F5 = fun(Map) ->
 2596:                  {#{Key := Value}, _} = {_, Key} = id(Map),
 2597:                  Value
 2598:          end,
 2599:     light = F5({#{frotz => light}, frotz}),
 2600: 
 2601:     F6 = fun(E) ->
 2602:                  #{Y := _} = (Y = ((_ = X) = E))
 2603:          end,
 2604:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,0},_}} = catch F6(id(0)),
 2605:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,#{}},_}} = catch F6(id(#{})),
 2606:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,#{key := value}},_}} = catch F6(id(#{key => value})),
 2607: 
 2608:     ok.
 2609: 
 2610: coverage(_Config) ->
 2611:     {'EXIT',{{badmatch,ok},_}} = catch coverage_1(),
 2612: 
 2613:     ok.
 2614: 
 2615: coverage_1() ->
 2616:     %% Cover beam_block:simplify_get_map_elements/4 when the type
 2617:     %% optimization pass is disabled.
 2618:     try #{ok := _V5, ok := _V4} = (maybe ok end) of
 2619:         #{ok := _V7, _V5 := _V7, ok := _V6, _V4 := _V6}  ->
 2620:             ok
 2621:     after
 2622:         ok
 2623:     end.
 2624: 
 2625: %% aux
 2626: 
 2627: rand_terms(0) -> [];
 2628: rand_terms(N) -> [rand_term()|rand_terms(N-1)].
 2629: 
 2630: rand_term() ->
 2631:     case rand:uniform(6) of
 2632: 	1 -> rand_binary();
 2633: 	2 -> rand_number();
 2634: 	3 -> rand_atom();
 2635: 	4 -> rand_tuple();
 2636: 	5 -> rand_list();
 2637: 	6 -> rand_map()
 2638:     end.
 2639: 
 2640: rand_binary() ->
 2641:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2642: 	1 -> <<>>;
 2643: 	2 -> <<"hi">>;
 2644: 	3 -> <<"message text larger than 64 bytes. yep, message text larger than 64 bytes.">>
 2645:     end.
 2646: 
 2647: rand_number() ->
 2648:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2649: 	1 -> rand:uniform(5);
 2650: 	2 -> float(rand:uniform(5));
 2651: 	3 -> 1 bsl (63 + rand:uniform(3))
 2652:     end.
 2653: 
 2654: rand_atom() ->
 2655:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2656: 	1 -> hi;
 2657: 	2 -> some_atom;
 2658: 	3 -> some_other_atom
 2659:     end.
 2660: 
 2661: 
 2662: rand_tuple() ->
 2663:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2664: 	1 -> {ok, rand_term()}; % careful
 2665: 	2 -> {1, 2, 3};
 2666: 	3 -> {<<"yep">>, 1337}
 2667:     end.
 2668: 
 2669: rand_list() ->
 2670:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2671: 	1 -> "hi";
 2672: 	2 -> [1,rand_term()]; % careful
 2673: 	3 -> [improper|list]
 2674:     end.
 2675: 
 2676: rand_map() ->
 2677:     case rand:uniform(3) of
 2678: 	1 -> #{ hi => 3 };
 2679: 	2 -> #{ wat => rand_term(), other => 3 };  % careful
 2680: 	3 -> #{ hi => 42, other => 42, yet_anoter => 1337 }
 2681:     end.
 2682: 
 2683: do_badmap(Test) ->
 2684:     Terms = [Test,fun erlang:abs/1,make_ref(),self(),0.0/id(-1),
 2685: 	     <<0:1024>>,<<1:1>>,<<>>,<<1,2,3>>,
 2686: 	     [],{a,b,c},[a,b],atom,10.0,42,(1 bsl 65) + 3],
 2687:     [Test(T) || T <- Terms].
 2688: 
 2689: %% Use this function to avoid compile-time evaluation of an expression.
 2690: id(I) -> I.
